title: Corda Password Configuration Schema
description: Configuration schema for the Password section.

userPasswordChangeExpiry.description: The amount of time (days) before the password must be updated again after user change.

adminPasswordChangeExpiry.description: The amount of time (days) before the password must be updated again after admin change

passwordExpiryWarningWindow.description: The time (days) before a password expires in which we begin to offer warnings about upcoming expiry.
